p: We further analyzed the cytobiocompatibility of the green synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles with Vero cell lines compared to the plant extract and chemically synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles using the live/dead staining technique. The results are displayed in Figure 9bâ€“e. The results demonstrated that the plant leaf extract and green synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles exerted the lowest levels of cytotoxic effects on Vero cells as fewer cells died ( Figure 9c,e). In contrast, chemically synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles exerted more cytotoxicity, and many cells appeared dead (Red) ( Figure 9d). The good cytobiocompatibility of the green synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles with the Vero cell lines might be attributed to the presence of phytomolecules of plant leaf extract.
